articles.title: Unearthed wonders: Stunning archaeological discoveries in recent times - The Times of India
articles.description: Archaeologists announced the discovery of six 9,000-year-old stone sewing needles near the shore of Lake Xiada Co in western Tibet. These tools, made via grinding, are the oldest of their kind found on the Tibetan Plateau, shedding light on early human techno…
articles.content: A geophysical survey covering over 1,000 hectares in Shropshire has revealed two grand Roman villas and multiple Iron Age farmsteads. This survey, the largest ever conducted by the National Trust, ut… [+163 chars]
